channel.title: 電影 on Literally Programming

item.title: 新世紀福音戰士——存在的焦慮令人窒息
item.description: 順便跟上 Netflix 上映的風潮，寫一下以前就想寫的心得。隨然還有很多內容（像是親情扮演的角色與夢的解析）可以稍加著墨，但對於一部似乎反對觀眾太沉迷於自

item.title: "Choose Life" They say.
item.description: “Choose Life” They say. Choose Life. Choose a job. Choose a career. Choose a family. Choose a fucking big television, choose washing machines, cars, compact disc players and electrical tin openers. Choose good health, low cholesterol, and dental insurance. Choose fixed interest mortgage repayments. Choose a starter home. Choose your friends. Choose leisurewear and matching luggage. Choose a three-piece suit on hire purchase in a range of fucking fabrics. Choose
